abstract: InBev, the world’s second-largest beer producer by volume, and Anheuser-Busch are in talks that could lead to a merger of the two, a Belgian business magazine, Trends, reported.
lead_paragraph: InBev, the world’s second-largest beer producer by volume, and Anheuser-Busch are in talks that could lead to a merger of the two, a Belgian business magazine, Trends, reported.

headline.main: Brewer Deal Rumors Prompt Talk of a Brawl
